inward.translation[0].definitions[0].def: felt or experienced in your own mind but not expressed to other people
inward.translation[0].definitions[1].def: towards the inside or centre of something
inward.translation[1].definitions[0].def: coming into the country or the place where you are, rather than going out of it
inward.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Financial deregulation may encourage inward investment.
